ResumePage.name: Sie Ren-Bin
ResumePage.about: Front End developer, dedicated to user-friendly UI UX, scalable web applications and also javascript ecosystem
ResumePage.summary: Specialized in full product development lifecycle, from concept to deployment. Experienced in international teams (Spain-based). Expert in building scalable and maintainable codebases. Core tech stack: JavaScript ecosystem (React, Next.js, Redux, Angular, RxJS) with Node.js backend experience.
